issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Implement div function in Gandiva
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5957](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5957). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement 'div' function for int32, int64, float32, and float64 (gandiva) types.
 div is integer division - divide and return quotient after discarding the fractional part.
 The function signature is `type div(type, type)`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5957?focusedCommentId=16886423) by Jacques Nadeau (jnadeau):*
Can you make sure to specify the planned function signature and impl for each function in the Jira description?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5957?focusedCommentId=16887929) by Pindikura Ravindra (pravindra):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4887
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4887>
